title: proposal: x/net/dns, vendor/golang.org/x/net/dns: new package
body: We currently have the startings of a nice DNS parsing and packing library in net/dnsmsg.go. This is useful for building custom DNS clients and servers in Go, but is not currently exported. I would like to propose moving this functionality to x/net/dns and vendoring it so that the same version can be used in the net package.
